headline: Consolidated Edison Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ED beats Q4 earnings and revenue estimates as electric, gas and steam sales rise, while issuing 2026 EPS guidance of $6.00-$6.20.
